name: Being Controlled
description:
A submission from Nathaniel O., Jonathan A., Domenic C., and Taylor B. for the Fall Game Jam 2021 at Fitchburg State University. Theme: Adaptation

When the game isn't sure what it wants the controls to be, who's really in control? Try to make it through three simple platformer levels all while fighting the game's indecisiveness! We would tell you the controls, but they kept changing on us too!
